title: Urban Environmental Comfort Design
description: Urban densification influences wind, temperature, noise, daylight and air quality at both city scale and street level.
intro: Urban densification influences wind, temperature, noise, daylight and air quality.
body:
This project studies how densification impacts environmental comfort metrics and how to design for better outcomes using twins.

We integrate microclimate, noise, daylight and air quality datasets into a city-scale model.
